info.description: CIPP-API is an Azure Function App operating as the logic layer for the CIPP platform. It is composed primarily of standard Azure Functions with a handful of Azure Durable Functions handling more complex actions (mostly applying standards and running tenant analysis). API documentation is primarily intended to aid in further development of the CIPP platform. This API will most likely be out-dated and we request users to help us keep this up to date.
info.title: CIPP-API Documentation

url.description: The base URL for the API. Enter your server URL here.
